title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Partners
body: Partners        Our partner, the American Hiking Society, cosponsored National Trails day at Fort Dupont Park on June 2, 2007. Many visitors came out to the park that day to learn about trails and help clear the Hollow Tree Trail.    Â    Below are a list of partners we work with or have worked with often in the past:     Civil War Defenses of Washington Sites Outside National Park Service Ownership D.C. Department of Parks and Recreation District of Columbia Chapter of the Maryland Native Plant Society Friends of Fort Dupont Ice Arena American Hiking Society Trips for Kids
